attilio mattiocco wrote:
> 
> Hi, I need to know if Junit is I18N enabled, but I didn't find anything about
> this argument on the documentation... Does anybody know if there are any known
> problems with DBCS environments?
> 
>                          thanks, Attilio Mattiocco

Attilio,
What is it exactly that you require from I18N enabled testing
environment?

What we have done with Junit is to change Locales and tested if strings
and dates etc. of our presentation layer objects come out correctly.
This is straightforward. What else would you like to do regarding I18N?

Johannes
subject: Re: [junit] Junit & I18N
